com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.meter.service

Class MeterCmdService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.meter.service.MeterCmdService

  • public class MeterCmdService
extends java.lang.Object
    Meter command business logic class, which control the TaiDoc Bus command ready to send and parsing the receive TaiDoc Bus command.
    Author:
    Cloud Tu, Jay Lee

    • Method Detail

      • appendOneByteCheckSumToCmd

        public static int[] appendOneByteCheckSumToCmd(int[] sourceCmd)
        Appends one byte check sum to the command

        將指令陣列未端再加一碼的CheckSum(e.g. 若原陣列長度若為7，在執行此Method後會變為8，並在最後一碼存放CheckSum之值)

        Parameters:
        sourceCmd - the command that need to append one bye check sum
        Returns:
        command that append one byte check sum

      • calculateOneByteCheckSum

        public static int calculateOneByteCheckSum(int[] cmd,
                           int startIndex,
                           int endIndex)
        Calculates one byte check sum
        Parameters:
        cmd - command array
        startIndex - calculates start index
        endIndex - calculates end index
        Returns:
        one byte check sum value

      • createTx25Cmd

        public static int[] createTx25Cmd(int dataIndex,
                  PCLinkLibraryEnum.User user)
        Create TaiDoc Bus command 25, for example [0x51,0x25,...]: Read Device Storage Data with Index, part 1.(time)
        Parameters:
        dataIndex - Storage Data Index between 0 and 65535
        user - PCLinkLibraryEnum.User
        Returns:
        TaiDoc Bus command 25
        Throws:
        if - data index is not between 0 and 65535, throw RuntimeException

      • createTx43Cmd

        public static int[] createTx43Cmd(int pressure,
                  int hold_time,
                  int mode,
                  int neonate)
        Create TaiDoc Bus command 43, for example [0x51,0x43,...]: Start measurement of BP meter
        Parameters:
        mode - 1->Neonate = 0 (Adult) 2->Deflation only 4->Taidoc Average Measurements (3 times) 5->HRV Mode 6->Arterial Stiffness
        Returns:
        TaiDoc Bus command 43

      • parseRx16Cmd

        public static TeleMedicalProfileRecord parseRx16Cmd(int[] rx16Cmd1,
                                    int[] rx16Cmd2,
                                    int[] rx16Cmd3,
                                    int[] rx16Cmd4,
                                    int[] rx16Cmd5)
        Parse the TaiDoc Bus command 16 to the TeleMedicalProfileRecord

        Note:

        • [0x51,0x16,...]: Read Tele-Medical Profile of Sensor Device
        Parameters:
        rx16Cmd1 - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command [0x51,0x16,0x01,...]
        rx16Cmd2 - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command [0x51,0x16,0x02,...]
        rx16Cmd3 - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command [0x51,0x16,0x03,...]
        rx16Cmd4 - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command [0x51,0x16,0x04,...]
        rx16Cmd5 - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command [0x51,0x16,0x05,...]
        Returns:
        Tele-Medical Profile, which is a TeleMedicalProfileRecord

        public static DeviceModelRecord parseRx22Cmd(int[] rx22Cmd)

      • parseRx22Cmd

        public static SystemClockRecord parseRx22Cmd(int[] rx22CmdYear,
                             int[] rx22CmdMonthAndDay,
                             int[] rx22CmdHourAndMinute)
        Parse the TaiDoc Bus command 22 to the SystemClockRecord

        Note:

        • [0x51,0x22,0x2...]: read the meter clock time, year
        • [0x51,0x22,0x4...]: read the meter clock time, month and day
        • [0x51,0x22,0x6...]: read the meter clock time, hour and minute
        Parameters:
        rx22CmdYear - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command 22 [0x51,0x22,0x2...]
        rx22CmdMonthAndDay - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command 22 [0x51,0x22,0x4...]
        rx22CmdHourAndMinute - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command 22 [0x51,0x22,0x6...]
        Returns:
        The meter clock time, which is a SystemClockRecord object.

      • parseRx22Cmds

        public static boolean parseRx22Cmds(int[] rx22Cmd)
        Parse the TaiDoc Bus command 22 to make sure, the meter is wake up.

        Note:

        • [0x51,0x22,...] : Read device serial number, part 1
        Parameters:
        rx22Cmd - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command 22
        Returns:
        verifies receive command success means, wrote the write device serial number done, return true, fail return false

      • parseRx2BCmd

        public static StorageNumberAndNewestIndexRecord parseRx2BCmd(PCLinkLibraryEnum.User user,
                                             int[] rx2BCmd,
                                             boolean is_BASE_FFFF)
        Parse the TaiDoc Bus command 2B to the StorageNumberAndNewestIndexRecord

        Note:

        • [0x51,0x2b,...] : Read Storage Number and Indexing of Stored Readings
        Parameters:
        user - PCLinkLibraryEnum.User
        rx2BCmd - the receive command array which sent by TaiDoc Bus command 2B
        startIdx - 一般的是以0為開始索引,而4255和2440是以0xffff開始, 0為第二個
        Returns:
        storage number of data and newest index, which is a StorageNumberAndNewestIndexRecord
